author: Staff Reporter
text:
General

Pondicherry Central University: Multicultural India: International Seminar on Multicultural India: Inclusiveness and New Humanities, Cultural-cum-Convention Centre, Pondicherry University, 10 a.m.

Ministry of External Affairs and Government of Puducherry: Inauguration of Passport Seva Kendra – Puducherry, Animal Husbandry and Animal Welfare Department Complex, Maraimalai Adigal Salai, 10 a.m.

Rajiv Gandhi National Institute of Youth Development and Pondicherry University: Inauguration of a Training of Trainers on Career Guidance and Counselling, Seminar Hall, School of Humanities, Silver Jubilee Campus, Pondicherry University, 10 a.m.
title: ENGAGEMENT
